title: Adapt Starter Course – English (Master Copy)
body:
Before beginning your course ensure you create a copy of this template.

Insert course description here (optional).
description: 2023 - Credit to CPP/OAS Noah MacPherson, Sophia Flatts,  and William Heighton for their initiation

_buttons.disabledAriaLabel: This button is disabled at the moment

_narrative.ariaRegion: Slide show. Select the next button to progress.

_hotgraphic.ariaRegion: Image with selectable areas. Select each button to show more information.

_accordion.ariaRegion: Accordion. Select each button to expand the content.

_matching.ariaRegion: Matching. Select from lists and then submit.

_textinput.ariaRegion: Text input. Type your answer and then submit.

_mcq.ariaRegion: Multiple choice question. Select your option and then submit.

_gmcq.ariaRegion: Multiple choice question. Select your option and then submit.

_slider.ariaRegion: Slider. Respond to the question by selecting a value on the scale and then submit.

_textinputinline.ariaRegion: This question requires you to input your answer in the textbox provided. When you have done so, select the submit button below.

_timedMcq.ariaRegion: This component is a timed multiple choice question. You must select the correct answer within the time limit.

_hotgrid.ariaRegion: Selectable image component. Select each item to show more information.

_stacklist.ariaRegion: This stacklist component presents a list of items. Select the button to access each item in turn.
_stacklist.ariaButtonLabel: Select this button to access the next item in the stacklist.

_vimeo.ariaRegion: This is a media component which displays a Vimeo video. Select the play / pause button to watch it.

_trickle.incompleteContent: There is incomplete content above. You must complete this before you can proceed through the course.

_pageLevelProgress.pageLevelProgressIndicatorBar: Page progress. Use this to listen to the list of regions in this topic and whether they're completed. You can jump directly to any that are incomplete or which sound particularly interesting. {{percentageComplete}}%
_pageLevelProgress.pageLevelProgressEnd: You have reached the end of the list of page sections.

_resources.title: Resources
_resources.description: Consult the resources for this course.

_resourcesItems.title: Example: Temporary Foreign Worker Program website
_resourcesItems.description: Example: Government of Canada Temporary Foreign Worker Program site.

_bookmarking.title: Bookmarking
_bookmarking.body: Would you like to continue where you left off?

_glossary.title: Glossary
_glossary.description: Specialized vocabulary used in this training.

_glossaryItems.description: Example: Work-Sharing (WS) is a government program designed to help employers and employees avoid layoffs when there is a temporary reduction in the normal level of business activity that is beyond the control of the employer.

_pageIncompletePrompt.title: Page incomplete
_pageIncompletePrompt.message: Are you sure you would like to leave? Remember that you need to open and select all the interactive elements on this page in order to complete this module. To find out which elements are complete and which ones are outstanding, select the Page Level Progress at the top right of the page. Select the No button in order to review the page level progress.
